author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Re HL Sensecurity Pte Ltd (formerly known as HL Integral Systems Pte Ltd)

tags-parsed: Companies/Winding up/Whether company unable to pay its debts/Whether directors acting in the affairs of the company in their own interests rather than in the interests of the members as a whole/Whether just and equitable to wind up company/Sections 254(1)(e), 254(1)(f), 254(1)(i) Companies Act (Cap 50, 1994 Rev Ed)
